body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Agnes Ellis. Father of Charles K. Ellis, Thomas Ellis, Laura Ellis, William Ellis, and Elizabeth Ellis. Farmer in Henry County in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Henry County in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Henry County in 1860.
